m_szDocTitle: Mitsubishi Outlander Plug-In Hybrid Not Hitting American Markets Till May 2016 (Rumor) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Mitsubishi Outlander Plug-In Hybrid Not Hitting American Markets Till May 2016 (Rumor) Originally published on EV Obsession . While the Mitsubishi Outlander Plug-in Hybrid (PHEV) has been available on the European and Japanese markets for literally years now, the American release just seems to be getting pushed back indefinitely. On that note, recent reports have stated that the popular plug-in hybrid SUV won’t be available in American showrooms until May 2016. As you probably realize, this puts the release date well after the (current) release date for the Model X — Tesla’s SUV offering, whic
